name: Exit Keeper
description:
Hello to whoever's reading this,

This is my first ever released game publicly and I personally think that it's garabage but i hope you can take some minutes of enjoyment out of it.

Thanks again for playing

Cheers

(itch.io has screwed the resoultion you can go in the inspector and the change the setting for the resolution to a litlle bit more and you can play the game - i tried to fix it for hours).
